scripts.watch:css: npm run compile:css && if-env NODE_ENV=development && (npm run compile-base:css -- --watch --output-style expanded) || (npm run compile-base:css -- --watch --output-style compressed)
scripts.compile:css: if-env NODE_ENV=development && (npm run compile-base:css -- --output-style expanded) || (npm run compile-base:css -- --output-style compressed)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ready && npm-run-all --parallel compile:src compile:css
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run launch
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run ready && npm-run-all --parallel watch:css watch:src watch
